name: Copper Shovel
desc: A sturdy shovel, good for digging up ground.

name: Ancient Pickaxe
desc: Great architects of the lost civilization must have used this to take down almost any wall in their way.

name: Copper Pickaxe
desc: A sturdy tool, well-suited for breaking down walls effortlessly.

name: Large Watering Can
desc: Used to water seeds and soil. Holds more water than a regular watering can.

name: Wood Pickaxe
desc: A crude tool, useful for breaking down walls.

name: Wood Shovel
desc: A crude shovel, useful for digging up ground.

name: Copper Hoe
desc: A sturdy tool to prepare ground for farming.

name: Tin Pickaxe
desc: A durable tool, good for breaking down walls more easily.

name: Tin Shovel
desc: A durable shovel, well-suited for digging up ground.

name: Tin Hoe
desc: A durable tool to prepare ground for farming.

name: Iron Pickaxe
desc: A strong tool, excellent for breaking down harder walls.

name: Iron Shovel
desc: A strong shovel, excellent for digging up ground.

name: Iron Hoe
desc: A strong tool to prepare ground for farming.

name: Scarlet Pickaxe
desc: A great tool for breaking down extremely hard walls.

name: Octarine Pickaxe
desc: An extraordinary tool for breaking down compact walls.

name: Wood Fishing Rod
desc: A crude tool for pulling up fish.

name: Tin Fishing Rod
desc: A durable tool for pulling up bigger fish.

name: Iron Fishing Rod
desc: A strong tool for pulling up rare fish.

name: Scarlet Fishing Rod
desc: A great tool for pulling up very resistable fish.

name: Octarine Fishing Rod
desc: An extraordinary tool for pulling up deep sea fish.

name: Red Paint Brush
desc: Used to paint certain objects red.

name: Yellow Paint Brush
desc: Used to paint certain objects yellow.

name: Green Paint Brush
desc: Used to paint certain objects green.

name: Purple Paint Brush
desc: Used to paint certain objects purple.

name: Blue Paint Brush
desc: Used to paint certain objects blue.

name: Brown Paint Brush
desc: Used to paint certain objects brown.

name: White Paint Brush
desc: Used to paint certain objects white

name: Black Paint Brush
desc: Used to paint certain objects black

name: Torch
desc: Light up your surroundings. Can also be placed on the ground.

name: Campfire
desc: Great for huddling together, telling stories and burning marshmallows to a crisp.

name: Decorative Pot
desc: Adding a plant to it will make for a nice decoration.

name: Pedestal
desc: Showcase your findings!

name: Stone Pedestal
desc: Showcase your findings!

name: Lamp
desc: Lights up when its powered with electricity.

name: Large Shiny Glimmering Object
desc: A crystalline, egg-shaped object. It will catch your eye even from large distances.

name: Titan's Chest
desc: A large, ancient chest crested with gemstones.

name: Dirt Wall
desc: A brown wall section.

name: Stone Wall
desc: A sturdy rock wall section.

name: Clay Wall
desc: A red, crumbly wall section.

name: Wood Wall
desc: A solid wall made from wood. Works well for building a base.

name: Larva Hive Wall
desc: A lumpy, moving...wall section?

name: Grass Wall
desc: A lush plant wall section.

name: Mold Wall
desc: A moldy wall section.

name: Sand Wall
desc: A yellow fragile wall section.

name: Turf Wall
desc: A soft, mossy wall section.

name: Scarlet Wall
desc: A reinforced metal wall to set up your base for tough encounters.

name: Dirt Ground
desc: A brown piece of ground.

name: Stone Ground
desc: A sturdy piece of ground.

name: Larva Hive Ground
desc: A lumpy piece of...ground?

name: Grass Ground
desc: A lush piece of groundplants.

name: Mold Ground
desc: An moldy piece of ground that releases infestious spores.

name: Beach Sand Ground
desc: A sandy piece of ground.

name: Clay Ground
desc: A red, crumbly piece of ground.

name: Sand Ground
desc: A yellow, fragile piece of ground.

name: Turf Ground
desc: A soft, mossy piece of ground.

name: Copper Bar
desc: A simple metal ingot for blacksmithing.

name: Iron Bar
desc: A strong metal ingot for blacksmithing.

name: Gold Bar
desc: A soft metal ingot for blacksmithing and jewelry.

name: Scarlet Bar
desc: A valuable ingot for high-tier blacksmithing.

name: Tin Bar
desc: A tough metal ingot for blacksmithing.

name: Octarine Bar
desc: A mysterious ingot for extraordinary blacksmithing.

name: Plank
desc: Wooden slate made for more precise carpentry work.

name: Copper Ore
desc: Commonly found in dirt walls.

name: Tin Ore
desc: Commonly found in clay walls.

name: Iron Ore
desc: Commonly found in stone walls.

name: Gold Ore
desc: Rarely found in clay and stone walls.

name: Scarlet Ore
desc: Scarlet ore commonly found in grass walls.

name: Octarine Ore
desc: Mysterious ore commonly found in limestone walls.

name: Slime
desc: An orange blob of slime. Can be further processed.

name: Poison Slime
desc: A purple blob of toxic slime. Can be further processed.

name: Slippery Slime
desc: A blue slime blob almost to slick to hold onto. Can be further processed.

name: Fiber
desc: Silky-smooth material for creating fabric and armor.

name: Larva Meat
desc: Only true survivors eat it raw.

name: Golden Larva Meat
desc: Rare, golden variant of larva meat with increased effects.

name: Mechanical Part
desc: A piece of ancient machinery.

name: Scrap Parts
desc: Different materials salvaged from junk.

name: Ancient Coin
desc: Valuable ancient coin, currency of the underground.

name: Ghorm's Horn
desc: A pointy gemstone that let a larva grow way beyond its maximum size.

name: Glurch Eye
desc: A bulbous gemstone that fused many slimes together into a giant one.

name: Heart of the Hive Mother
desc: A giant ancient gemstone that mutated its owner into a monstrosity.

name: Giant Slime Summoning Idol
desc: Crystal idol to reawaken a Giant Slime. Consumed upon placing it on any Giant Slime summoning rune.

name: Ghorm Summoning Idol
desc: Crystal idol to reawaken Ghorm the Devourer. Consumed upon placing it on Ghorm's summoning rune.

name: Hive Mother Summoning Idol
desc: Crystal idol to reawaken the Hive Mother. Consumed upon placing it on the Hive Mother's summoning rune.

name: Skull of the Corrupted Shaman
desc: A reforged crystal skull that whispers ancient chants. It urges you to place it on the throne room sigil.

name: Ancient Hologram Pod
desc: A strange device that materializes spirits of the past.

name: Mysterious Idol
desc: A crystalline core statue. May attract someone looking for mysterious idols if placed in a habitable room.

name: Slime Oil
desc: A jar filled with slime essence, used for beard care. Place it in a habitable room and a bearded character may move in.

name: Furnace
desc: This standard furnace melts basic metal ores.

name: Electronics Table
desc: Workbench to create electronical and logical systems.

name: Carpenter Table
desc: Workbench for crafting decorative furnishing.

name: Alchemy Table
desc: Workbench to tinker with the wonders of chemistry.

name: Table Saw
desc: A simple saw to cut materials into slates.

name: Iron Workbench
desc: Essential workbench for survival in the underground.

name: Copper Anvil
desc: Get started with creating armor for looks and combat.

name: Jewelry Workbench
desc: Workbench for creating rings & necklaces.

name: Cooking Pot
desc: Cooking ingredients brings out their full potential, combine two and see what happens!

name: Iron Anvil
desc: Great for creating high tier equipment.

name: Smelter Kiln
desc: A kiln that can melt valuable ores.

name: Scarlet Workbench
desc: Greater workbench to be prepared for the outer cave systems.

name: Railway Forge
desc: Advanced forge to create underground rail systems.

name: Painter's Table
desc: Workbench to create a selection of colorful brushes.

name: Tin Anvil
desc: A better anvil for creating gear and weapons more suited for survival.

name: Scarlet Anvil
desc: A very advanced anvil for creating supreme equipment.

name: Automation Table
desc: Workbench for creating complex machines.

name: Cartography Table
desc: A table to share your map discoveries with other explorers.

name: Octarine Anvil
desc: A strange anvil for creating extraordinary equipment.

name: Salvage and Repair Station
desc: Scraps tools and equipment you don't need or refurbishes broken ones.

name: Distillery Table
desc: A workbench to produce more advanced potions and explosives.

name: Portal
desc: Allows teleporting to other portals that has been placed out. The portal takes 20 minutes to charge up before it can be used once it has been placed.

name: Electricity Generator
desc: Powers wires and objects with electricity.

name: Wood Floor
desc: Simple wooden slates for decorating your base.

name: Wood Fence
desc: A simple fence to protect what's rightfully yours.

name: Wood Bridge
desc: Used to cross chasms and water but also makes for a nice floor.

name: Stone Floor
desc: Simple rock slates for decorating your base.

name: Stone Fence
desc: A more reinforced fence to protect what's rightfully yours.

name: Stone Bridge
desc: Used to cross chasms and water but also makes for a nice floor.

name: Scarlet Floor
desc: A reinforced metal floor tile with a nice crimson alloy.

name: Scarlet Fence
desc: A reinforced metal fence to protect what's rightfully yours.

name: Scarlet Bridge
desc: Used to cross chasms and water but also makes for a nice floor.

name: Rug
desc: Cover up the cold ground and make your base cozy.

name: Woven Mat
desc: Groundcover made from a net of firm plants.

name: Bed
desc: A place to sleep. Also allows friendly inhabitants to move in if placed in a room to their liking.

name: Caveling Skull
desc: Remains of what was once a proud civilization.

name: Leaf Fossil
desc: Proof of a once flourshing environment.

name: Ammonite
desc: The petrified shell of an ancient sea creature.

name: Geode
desc: Half of a rock with beautiful crystals inside.

name: Broken Core Idol
desc: A familiar looking object.

name: Ocarina
desc: A timeless instrument.

name: Old Amulet
desc: Brittle stone jewelry. Too small to be worn by a human.

name: Ear Plate
desc: A squarish earring plated with gold.

name: Bone Creole
desc: A crude piece of jewelry carved from bone.

name: Triangle Trinket
desc: A strange gold piece vibrating with energy.

name: Twisted Agate
desc: A green gem shaped like a spiral.

name: Blood Skull
desc: The crimson remains of someone meeting a terrible fate.

name: Grub Knot
desc: A mutated lump of small grubs. Disgusting.

name: Petrified Egg
desc: Fossilized egg shell, it feels light and brittle.

name: Old Spore Mask
desc: An old mask protecting against air-borne spores. It's broken but may still fetch a good price.

name: Hard Thorn
desc: A sturdy wooden thorn, someone may have a use for it.

name: Balloon Spore
desc: A fluffy giant spore. It's non-toxic but also not very useful.

name: Caveling Doll
desc: A handmade doll found in a grave. It must once have belonged to a child...

name: Small Caveling Skull
desc: A caveling skull, smaller than usual. It hints at a tragic story.

name: Golden Feather
desc: It's big and shiny, a must have for collectors.

name: Mechanical Arm
desc: Overgrown piece of ancient technology. The joints are stiff but it must have performed remarkable tasks in the past.

name: Dry Butterfly
desc: A dead insect void of any moisture. It is nice to look at but needs to be handled with care.

name: Precious Urn
desc: A pretty decorative without any cracks and blemishes but its original contents are long gone.

name: Amber Chunk
desc: Solid remains of an ancient forest. The light it reflects is warm and golden.

name: Petrified Coral
desc: Grey and porous piece of a giant eco system. The ocean it belonged to seems long gone.

name: Mold Dew
desc: Golden-colored dew that emanated from mold spores, maybe someone can find a use for it.

name: Fungal Bone
desc: Rotten with mold down to the marrow, its owner must have suffered greatly.

name: Mildew Leaf
desc: A leaf with white mold spots on it, apart from that it looks unscathed.

name: Chipped Plate
desc: An old stone plate. What kind of food has been served on it?

name: Stone Cap
desc: Rock-hard mushrooms attached to a stone slate. They look edible but are actually fossilized.

name: Giant Mite
desc: A motionless crimson critter. It just sits there...watching...

name: Rusty Spoon
desc: An old, corroded eating utensil. Almost every culture has invented those.

name: Green Kelp
desc: Green lump of marine plants, not that useful.

name: Golden Starfish
desc: A razorsharp ocean critter polished clean by currents.

name: Amber Fish Egg
desc: A perfectly preserved fish egg encapsulated in amber. How those two combined is a mystery.

name: Soft Sponge
desc: A soft, squishy sponge. Time to take a bath!

name: Adder Stone
desc: A porous smooth stone, some believe it wards off evil spirits.

name: Caveling Perfume
desc: A blue fragrance bottle. It is tightly sealed but emits a heavenly scent.

name: Enhydro Crystal
desc: Ancient water is encapsulated in this beautiful crystal. It's been in there for millions of years.

name: Mucus Amoeba
desc: A slimy giant amoeba, it seems to be looking at you.

name: Parasite Fossil
desc: The petrified remains of an ancient parasite, it is uncertain if it's really dead.

name: Golden Cocoon
desc: A gold-plated chrysalis, this doesn't seem to be its final form.

name: Grub Pearl
desc: Is it a grub-shaped pearl or a pearl-like grub?

name: Giant Germ
desc: A big bacterium wiggling around in your hand, fascinating and gross at the same time.

name: Mold Shell
desc: The fuzzy, pale housing of a critter that has moved on.

name: Ceremonial Flute
desc: An ancient, precious instrument but it is clogged.

name: Data Slate
desc: A stone disc with peculiar engravings, it must contain mysterious records.

name: Lost Paddle
desc: Somewhere someone must paddle around in circles.

name: Feather Fish Scale
desc: Scale of the Feather Fish, it is sturdy but as light as a feather.

name: Caveling Medal
desc: Minted medallion with a face relief. Has it been awarded to someone extraordinary once?

name: Rainbow Kelp
desc: A super rare mutation of common kelp, showing off a variety of colors.

name: Bubble Pearl
desc: A beautiful, iridescent pearl. It seems to be hollow.

name: Black Bubble Pearl
desc: A black variant of the bubble pearl, from certain angles it appears golden.

name: Sealed Beverage
desc: An unknown liquid slushes inside when shaken. Is there an ancient corkscrew around?

name: Shark Tooth
desc: It's as big as the palm of a hand, meeting with a row of those will end up fatal.

name: Forked Coral
desc: A trident-shaped coral, not very valuable but nice to look at.

name: Petrified Trilobite
desc: The fossil of a long gone critter species. They are ancestors of a big variety of lifeforms.

name: Rusty Fishing Hook
desc: Rusted to the core and unusable. That fish was too big to handle, pal.

name: Fish Fossil
desc: The imprint of an ancient fish on a rock slate.

name: Fizzy Crystal
desc: A bubbly stone that is as clear as water. It weighs almost nothing.

name: Grey Kelp
desc: Grey lump of marine plants, not that useful.

name: Yellow Kelp
desc: Yellow lump of marine plants, not that useful.

name: Pale Kelp
desc: Pale lump of marine plants, not that useful.

name: Red Kelp
desc: Red lump of marine plants, not that useful.

name: Early Human Skull
desc: Remains of a human that lived about 200.000 years ago. Has mankind found these caves before?

name: Golden Caveling Mask
desc: An intricate mask with a stern expression, probably used in a ritual or by someone of high ranks.

name: Ancient Gem Plate
desc: This shimmering plate has intricate engravings, it looks like a key to something.

name: Antique Board Game
desc: An ancient game for two players, there is no rulebook but apparently it was about shifting blocks around.

name: Music Bowl
desc: A precious bowl holding a golden cylinder. It plays a faint, almost melancholic melody.

name: Seismic Clock
desc: This broken device looks like it was able to predict earthquakes.

name: Old Journal
desc: A leather-bound book with crumbly pages. It is written in familiar letters but a language you don't know.

name: Mysterious Doll Set
desc: A pair of green dolls wearing clothes, sitting together they look like great pals.

name: Ritual Goblet
desc: An ancient chalice made from stone and gems. It's insides are layered with dark red residue.

name: Oracle Card "Entity"
desc: A bent card with golden borders and an image of the core. Looks like it's part of a set.

name: Glurch Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of Glurch the Abominous Mass.

name: Ivy Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of Ivy the Poisonous Mass.

name: Ghorm Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of Ghorm the Devourer.

name: Slime Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of a common Orange Slime.

name: Purple Slime Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of a poisonous Purple Slime.

name: Red Slime Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of an aggressive Red Slime.

name: Acid Larva Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of an Acid Larva.

name: Larva Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of a Larva.

name: Big Larva Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of a Big Larva.

name: Hive Larva Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of a Hive Larva.

name: Big Hive Larva Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of a Big Hive Larva.

name: Caveling Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of a Caveling.

name: Caveling Gardener Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of a Caveling Gardener.

name: Caveling Hunter Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of a Caveling Hunter.

name: Caveling Shaman Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of a Caveling Shaman.

name: Infected Caveling Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of a Infected Caveling.

name: Caveling Brute Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of a Caveling Brute.

name: Azeos Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of Azeos the Sky Titan.

name: Malugaz Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of Malugaz the Corrupted.

name: Tentacle Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of a Tentacle.

name: Mold Tentacle Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of a Mold Tentacle.

name: Snare Plant Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of a Snare Plant.

name: Blue Slime Figurine
desc: A lifelike representation of a slippery Blue Slime.

name: Oracle Card "Aura"
desc: A ripped card with golden borders and an image of an ancient gemstone. Looks like it's part of a set.

name: Oracle Card "Brilliance"
desc: A charred card with golden borders and an image of a Glow Tulip. Looks like it's part of a set.

name: Mushroom
desc: A small cave mushroom, perfect for a snack on the go.

name: Giant Mushroom
desc: The king of all mushrooms, growing in perfect conditions made it unusually large.

name: Chrysalis
desc: Icky groundcover that feels strange to walk across. Larvas will infest chrysalis covered areas over time.

name: Ground Slime
desc: Sticky material that slows down careless adventurers. Slime blobs will start to coagulate from slime covered surfaces over time.

name: Ground Poison Slime
desc: Sticky material that builds up toxine in the body.

name: Ground Slippery Slime
desc: Slick material that makes it difficult to get a steady footing.

name: Ancient Crate
desc: A mysteriously glowing container holding ancient goods.

name: Amber Larva
desc: Grub encapsulated in amber, an extremely rare ingredient.

name: Wooden Crate
desc: A wooden box used by someone to store random goods.

name: Flower Vessel
desc: A yellow plant containing organic loot.

name: Bush
desc: Stubby patch of grass to use as a decorative.

name: Tall Grass
desc: Large patch of tall grass to use as a decorative.

name: Camp Tent
desc: An abandoned makeshift tent, who would have lived here?

name: Camp Matress
desc: The resting place of a former adventurer?

name: Mold Vessel
desc: A hollow, fuzzy fungus. Breaking it open may yield some useful goods.

name: Caveling Floor Tile
desc: A crumbly stone slab with simple patterns embedded in it.

name: Broken Stone Pillar
desc: Unstable pillar for decoration, probably thousands of years old.

name: Caveling Pot
desc: An urn made from stone filled with the belongings of cavelings.

name: Caveling Table
desc: A crude, blocky piece of furniture, many meals must have been shared on it.

name: Caveling Chair
desc: A stool made from stone.

name: Caveling Toilet
desc: Between mining there must be time for serious business.

name: Caveling Bed
desc: Doesn't look very comfortable.

name: Water Well
desc: An ancient stone well to take water from.

name: Dark Caveling Floor Tile
desc: A dark version of the ancient floor tiles, it looks much older.

name: Caveling throne
desc: This unusual seat is proof of an empire fallen to ruin.

name: Mold Well
desc: You surely don't want to water your plants with its contents.

name: Mold Pillar
desc: An ancient pillar featuring the core, it is overgrown by mold.

name: Beached Jelly
desc: A gelatinous creature containing goods from the sea.

name: Land Kelp
desc: A type of kelp that can grow outside of water.

name: Tall Land Kelp
desc: A large type of kelp that can grow outside of water.

name: Fishing Net Rack
desc: A loose net thrown across some stakes to dry in the air.

name: Driftwood Table
desc: Someone made this from materials floating in the water.

name: Driftwood Stool
desc: A simple stool made with beach materials.

name: Tombstone
desc: Now that the worst is over, use it to decorate!

name: Lever
desc: Switches the flow of electricity on and off.

name: Electrical Wire
desc: Connects sources of electricity to machines and apparatuses.

name: Electricity Stick
desc: Emits a very low electricity that is too low to power up objects but useful to change behaviour of logic circuits.

name: Rail
desc: Traverse the underground world much faster.

name: Minecart
desc: Allows riding the railways.

name: Boat
desc: Allows travelling over water. Equipped with a turret to fend of enemies.

name: Hive Spike Trap
desc: A larva hive trap made out of sharp bones, damaging any creature who steps on it.

name: Spike Trap
desc: A mechanical spike trap that only reacts to enemies.

name: Sprinkler
desc: A useful gadget that waters tilled ground in a small radius when powered with electricity.

name: Heart Berry Seed
desc: Grows into a healthy fruit when planted.

name: Heart Berry
desc: A sweet, juicy berry that refreshes the body.

name: Glow Tulip Seed
desc: Grows into a luminescent flower when planted.

name: Bomb Pepper Seed
desc: Grows into a spicy vegetable when planted.

name: Bomb Pepper
desc: A fierce vegetable for spicing up foods.

name: Carrock Seed
desc: A tough seed that only grows in stone.

name: Carrock
desc: Rock-hard vegetable that toughens you up.

name: Puffungi Seed
desc: A seed that only grows in mold.

name: Puffungi
desc: A moldy fungus fit for gourmets.

name: Root Seed
desc: Once planted it spreads roots in every direction.

name: Grub Kapok Seed
desc: Turns into a plant that gives fiber when harvested.

name: Golden Heart Berry
desc: A very rare variant of the common heart berry.

name: Golden Bomb Pepper
desc: A very rare variant of the common bomb pepper.

name: Golden Carrock
desc: A very rare variant of the common carrock.

name: Golden Puffungi
desc: A very rare variant of the common puffungi.

name: Recall Idol
desc: Teleports you back to the core, consumed in the process.

name: Hive Mother scanner
desc: Scans the world for the Hive Mother. Consumed on successful scan.

name: Ghorm the Devourer Scanner
desc: Scans the world for Ghorm the Devourer. Consumed on successful scan.

name: Azeos the Sky Titan Scanner
desc: Scans the world for Azeos the Sky Titan. Consumed on successful scan.

name: Rune Parchment
desc: A unusually well preserved piece of ancient paper. The runes are impossible to decipher but small symbols hint at it being the recipe for a strange weapon.

name: Lantern
desc: A small, useful light that leaves your main hand free.

name: Orb Lantern
desc: A better, brighter version of off-hand light to carry around.

name: Small Lantern
desc: A weak light to be carried in the offhand.

name: Wooden Shield
desc: A useful off-hand item to block hits from enemies.

name: Toxic Defender
desc: A shield covered in toxic grime. Has a chance to poison enemies when blocking attacks.

name: Swift Feather
desc: A mysterious feather that allows you to dash out of danger.

name: Blue Leather Tome
desc: An ancient book with stitched blue covers. Is that skin?

name: Cave Pouch
desc: Every underground miner needs one of those!

name: Ghorm's Stomach Bag
desc: A well-preserved stomach portion of the Devourer, comes with a handy strap.

name: Scarlet Shell Backpack
desc: A hard-case backpack with lots of space and additional protection.

name: Explorer Backpack
desc: A simple backpack made for traveling the underground caves. Holds quite a few items.

name: Octarine Bag
desc: A strange bag that has more space inside than it looks like from the outside.

name: Copper Helm
desc: Resembles more of a bucket but repels strong blows to the head.

name: Wood Helm
desc: Slight protection for the head but you should look for better options soon.

name: Peasant Hat
desc: Simple leather hat, doesn't look that great but does its job.

name: Caveling Hood
desc: Light armor hood that hides the face.

name: Iron Helm
desc: Tough helm fit for knights. Comes with a visor and a flamboyant plume.

name: Bronze Helm
desc: This helm repels slight blows to the head.

name: Carapace Helm
desc: A chitin plated head piece, wearing it fills you with the urge to dig paths through the darkness.

name: Larva Helm
desc: No need for fancy hats. Just grub.

name: Scarlet Helm
desc: Menacing-looking horned helm, fits perfectly with the rest of the set.

name: Hunter Hood
desc: This hood is made from big leaves tucked into a headband. Lets you blend into green environments.

name: Farmer's Hat
desc: Tuck a straw in your mouth and get ready for a whole day of relaxing on the porch.

name: Carapace Breastplate
desc: An organic body armor resembling Ghorms shell, it is heavy and feels weird on the inside.

name: Scarlet Breastplate
desc: Fierce upper body armor for true warriors.

name: Hunter Cloak
desc: A cloak crafted from big leaves woven together. Makes you look like a walking bush.

name: Ivy's Thorn Harness
desc: This organic breastplate armor is crested with thorns, allowing for stronger critical hits.

name: Grub Egg Necklace
desc: This odd necklace seems to have a life of its own.

name: Iron Chunk Necklace
desc: A heavy piece of jewelry that increases defence.

name: Heart Berry Necklace
desc: A heart berry on the neck makes for an easy snack!

name: Ammonite Necklace
desc: Simple but beautiful necklace featuring a fossil.

name: Gold Crystal Necklace
desc: A shiny trinket combining the most valuable of materials.

name: Blob Rosary Necklace
desc: Sticky necklace infused with energy made for an unknown purpose.

name: Remedaisy Necklace
desc: Jewelry made from a rare plant that repels poison.

name: Ancient Guardian Necklace
desc: A truly powerful relic of the past, made for fending off the strongest of foes.

name: Mold Vein Necklace
desc: A circle of white organic filaments, it latches onto the skin.

name: Cave Guppy Necklace
desc: Odd necklace made from a fish that never let go of the hook.

name: Bubble Pearl Necklace
desc: Natural grown jewelry made from rare bubble pearls.

name: Polished Iron Chunk Necklace
desc: A heavy piece of jewelry that increases defence.

name: Polished Gold Crystal Necklace
desc: A shiny trinket combining the most valuable of materials.

name: Ancient Gem Necklace
desc: A necklace crafted with only using ancient gemstones as well as a super rare white version.

name: Skull Necklace
desc: A morbid necklace made from tiny caveling skulls. They're too small to have been children.

name: Clot Ring
desc: A blood-red ring that latches onto your finger.

name: Larva Ring
desc: A living ring, not for the squirmish to wear.

name: Wooden Thorn Ring
desc: A circular, brambly root with sharp thorns pointing outward.

name: Glow Tulip Ring
desc: A luminous ring that holds the essence of glow tulips.

name: Swift Ring
desc: Wearing this winged ring creates a slight wind that pushes you forward.

name: Ring of Rock
desc: Simple ring found in the deepest of rocks.

name: Ring of Stone
desc: Simple ring carved out of stone.

name: Gold Crystal Ring
desc: A precious ring featuring an ancient gemstone.

name: Melting Crystal Ring
desc: A gooey ring dripping slippery slime on the floor.

name: Sky Ring
desc: This ring reminds you of the wide open sky.

name: Caveling Mother's Ring
desc: An old crystal ring, holding it fills you with a sad feeling you can't describe.

name: Petal Ring
desc: A precious ring that has naturally grown in the yellow blossoms of the jungle caves.

name: Rusted Ring
desc: A ring from the depths that someone must have lost long time ago.

name: Sea Foam Ring
desc: A transluscent ring that looks like a wave frozen in time.

name: Polished Gold Crystal Ring
desc: A precious ring featuring an ancient gemstone.

name: Polished Glow Tulip Ring
desc: A luminous ring that holds the essence of glow tulips.

name: Polished Swift Ring
desc: Wearing this winged ring creates a slight wind that pushes you forward.

name: Ancient Gem Ring
desc: This mysterious ring is entirely made out of ancient gemstones, featuring a super rare white one.

name: Ivy's Ring
desc: An organic ring grown from slime covered thorns.

name: Skull Ring
desc: A grotesque blood-red ring, crested with a tiny caveling skull.

name: Copper Sword
desc: A good weapon for slaying foes.

name: Iron Sword
desc: A strong weapon for slaying foes.

name: Scarlet Sword
desc: A great weapon for slaying foes.

name: Tin Sword
desc: A sharp weapon for slaying foes.

name: Slime Sword
desc: A strange weapon, good for damaging enemies and slowing them down.

name: Octarine Sword
desc: An extraordinary weapon for slaying foes.

name: Larva Spike Club
desc: A bludgeoning weapon that is hard to withstand.

name: Poisonous Sickle
desc: Farming tool that turned into a weapon when a great threat had to be slain.

name: Broken Handle
desc: A piece of an ancient weapon. Even though it's only the handle it already feels mysteriously balanced in your hand.

name: Rune Song
desc: A legendary sword that hums when swung through the air. Its durability is a sign of extraordinary craftsmanship and it has the power to defeat enemies in one strike.

name: Tin Dagger
desc: A small blade that allows for quick stabs.

name: Tin Axe
desc: A slower but more damaging weapon against multiple enemies.

name: Battle Axe
desc: A menacing weapon that swings wide and hits hard.

name: Scarlet Dagger
desc: This wavy, crimson dagger pierces through most materials.

name: Ritual Dagger
desc: This unusual dagger is made from a big gemstone shard. There are dark red spots on the handle.

name: Bomb
desc: A stronger explosive for crowd control and facing giant enemies.

name: Crude Bomb
desc: A small explosive to blast walls and enemies.

name: Large Bomb
desc: A very strong explosive for massive destruction.

name: Flintlock Musket
desc: Can't argue much with a handful of lead coming right at you.

name: Slingshot
desc: Simple ranged weapon to fire away at enemies.

name: Grubzooka
desc: The heavy shots from the Grubzooka also makes it tear down any dirt, sand and turf walls in its path.

name: Hand Mortar
desc: Problems that can't be solved can usually be blasted away.

name: Blowpipe
desc: A simple weapon loaded with poisonous darts.

name: Fireball Staff
desc: A magical staff that the caveling shamans use in their rituals and against uninvited guests.

name: Healing Potion
desc: A healthy elixir that heals instantly. Also tastes good.

name: Enrage Potion
desc: A strong elixir that buffs your muscles and your temper.

name: Stoneskin Potion
desc: A salty elixir that hardens your skin and makes you more resilient.

name: Poison Aid Potion
desc: A purple, mucky liquid that tastes horrible but cures any poison.

name: Greater Healing Potion
desc: A much healthier elixir that heals instantly. Also tastes great.

name: Keen Potion
desc: A cold elixir that focuses your senses and aim.

name: Guardian's Potion
desc: A potion that fills you with great courage and the ability to withstand the strongest of foes.

name: Caveling Bread
desc: Dry, hard bread. It feels like chewing chalk but fills the stomach.

name: Jingle Jam Cookie
desc: A special gift for participating in the Jingle Jam charity event.

name: Food Ration
desc: Canned meal made to last for years. You should look for better food options soon.

name: Orange Cave Guppy
desc: Small, orange fish home to the dirt cave lakes.

name: Blue Cave Guppy
desc: Small, blue fish home to the dirt cave lakes.

name: Rock Jaw
desc: A small shark that can break almost every material with one bite.

name: Gem Crab
desc: This rare crab has ancient gemstones growing all over it.

name: Dagger Fin
desc: The scales of this fish are thin like razorblades.

name: Pink Palace Fish
desc: A pink, odd looking fish with weirdly shaped fins.

name: Teal Palace Fish
desc: A greenish-blue odd looking fish with weirdly shaped fins.

name: Crown Squid
desc: All hail the pale king of water!

name: Yellow Blister Head
desc: A yellow fish with large bubbles on its head.

name: Green Blister Head
desc: A green fish with large bubbles on its head.

name: Devil Worm
desc: A hellspawn that dwells in the sea ground. Don't step on it.

name: Vampire Eel
desc: A bloodsucking fish latching onto everything that has a pulse.

name: Mold Shark
desc: A small predator of the murky mold waters.

name: Rot Fish
desc: Half of its body is missing but somehow it's still alive. Creepy.

name: Black Steel Urchin
desc: A rare sea critter with spikes as hard as steel.

name: Azure Feather Fish
desc: A beautiful blue fish with scales that look like feathers.

name: Emerald Feather Fish
desc: A beautiful green fish with scales that look like feathers.

name: Spirit Veil
desc: A ghastly fish that floats in the air like it's still underwater.

name: Astral Jelly
desc: Extremely rare type of jellyfish. It almost feels like out of this world.

name: Chipped Blade
desc: A piece of an ancient weapon. Its glass-like appearance makes it look fragile but it's harder than any material you've seen.

name: Crystal Skull Shard
desc: An ancient crystal shard that is only the fraction of something bigger.
